title: Choose the subscription that suits you

offers.name: Standard
offers.body:
* Access to Premium articles on Telegraph.co.uk, The Telegraph News app and Apple News

* Newsletters and daily briefings

* Subscriber-only events and exclusive rewards.

offers.name: All Digital Access
offers.description: Free for 30 days then £3pw for the first 3 months
offers.body:
* All of the benefits of a Standard subscription
* The daily newspaper, delivered to your smartphone or tablet, every day from 5am
